parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Plural
Verb - Future Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From apo and didomi; to give away, i.e. Up, over, back, etc.
From lego; something said; by implication, a topic, also reasoning or motive; by extension, a computation; specially, the Divine Expression.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Dative Masculine Singular
str2: To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.
Readily. Adverb from hetoimos; in readiness.
Properly, to distinguish, i.e. Decide; by implication, to try, condemn, punish.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Accusative Masculine Plural
str2: To live, be alive. A primary verb; to live.
(a) adj: dead, lifeless, subject to death, mortal, (b) noun: a dead body, a corpse. From an apparently primary nekus; dead.
